sentences.english: Goh Teck Sien is our first year missiological student in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 吴哲仙是卫理神学院2009年宣教科一年级学生。

sentences.english: Ethan Christofferson and his family spent an extended time in America as he studied at Trinity Evangelical Divinity School.
sentences.chinese: 陈义圣牧师则返回美国进入三一神学院继续深造。

sentences.english: In 2000, she studied the graduate courses at Xinjing Theological Seminary.
sentences.chinese: 2000年在信经神学院读函授研究生，肄业。

sentences.english: Ecclesiastical Academy of Holy Etchmiadzin is also here.
sentences.chinese: 圣埃奇米阿津神学院也建在这里。

sentences.english: I vacillated for a long time between medicine and seminary .
sentences.chinese: 在学医和进神学院之间我犹豫了很久。

sentences.english: Wong Ling Kee is the first year student in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 黄灵麒是卫理神学院2006年一年级神学生。

sentences.english: Prof. Lo Lung Kwong, director of the Divinity School, will serve as moderator.
sentences.chinese: 研讨会将由崇基学院神学院院长卢龙光教授主持。

sentences.english: He became a seminarian because he felt it his calling.
sentences.chinese: 由于感受到神的召唤，他成为了神学院的学生。

sentences.english: One of them is the Claremont School of Theology, where the university is located.
sentences.chinese: 其中之一是克莱蒙神学院，也是这所大学的所在地。

sentences.english: Er professor, Covenant Seminary and Wheaton College.
sentences.chinese: 旧约教授，曾任教于圣约神学院，惠敦大学。

sentences.english: And I am a seminary graduated all kind of that thing.
sentences.chinese: 我是个神学院研究生，研究所有这些东西。
他本人于2005年从伯特利神学院毕业。

sentences.english: And their seminaries are not at the intellectual level of the universities, " says Dr Tan.
sentences.chinese: 他们的神学院赶不上大学教育水平。

sentences.english: After graduation he worked several years in Hong Kong and then entered a seminary to equip himself.
sentences.chinese: 大学毕业回港工作数年后进入神学院，接受装备。
